Articles.Content:
Getting tired with imitating famous fighters, I am planing to build a plugin that could change KSP to a fighter simulating game

http://imgur.com/a/xV9jl/embed

Now has all control surfaces animated and effective rudder.

Still working on lift to get it rid of dependence on "ModuleControlSurface".

And still have no idea with landing gears...

Thank @Honefox for help

Edited February 28, 2014 by flywlyx

-Reaction gif- HOLY CRAP THAT LOOKS AWESOME! Though this should be more in the Development thread, just sayin...

Removed reaction gif

-Reaction gif- HOLY CRAP THAT LOOKS AWESOME! Though this should be more in the Development thread, just sayin...
You are right! I am finding the way to move it to there... Edited September 2, 2013 by DYJ

Ask a moderator.

Another thing.

This is amazing. V-22 rapter? I'M IN!

Now, all I need is an F-18.

And a F-14 Tomcat

F-16 is needed more than an F-18

also what about an F-111

Moved it to the correct subforum as per authors request. Please refrain from posting reaction pics since we have a rule against that. "2.3 Other forbidden messages Messages that lack any substantial content, for example messages that contain only reaction images, simply a '+1' or jargon;"
Has that model and/or texture just been lifted wholesale from another source?

Has that model and/or texture just been lifted wholesale from another source?

This was my thought as well...

I fully support everybody doing their own thing, but personally, I'm not a big fan of single-craft mods. Kind of takes away from the point of KSP in my eyes.
Model and texture come from game HAWX. But as I mentioned in the titleÃ¯Â¼Å’ this thread is about the plugin...

That's not originally from HAWX. It's a IDOLM@STER DLC skin for Ace Combat 6 (since they're both made by Namco).

That's cool, Kerbal Space Combat.

Kerbal Space Combat.

Please, we all know it's Kerbal Space Battlefield.
See, this kind of crap is why normal people judge people who are into anime.
